title: Jailed by the Billionaire - Olivia Makes a Deal (Jailed by the Billionaire Series Book 1 - A Darkly Erotic Tale of Discovery and Submission: Olivia Makes a Deal- Jailhouse Fantasy
description: Olivia is about to go to jail for a crime she didn't commit when a handsome billionaire offers her a deal she can't refuse. Olivia will earn her freedom by becoming a different kind of prisoner. Will this new jailer open Olivia to a side of life she hasn't imagined yet? Will the studs of this jailhouse fill her and stretch her but leave her wanting more?  This is an erotic tale of sex, discovery, passion and intrigue. For mature audiences only!
author: Jasmine Knights
